about_the_game:
Game Info

One day, a phone call rings at the GuGu Pizza shop...

“Hello? This is the space station. Could you deliver 5 Hawaiian pizzas for us?” The owner doesn’t hesitate and packs the delivery boxes, deciding to send the pigeon deliveryman to space.

However, this delivery is no ordinary task. On the way to space with the pizza, there are dangers of falling, obstacles, and unpredictable challenges waiting.

『GuGu Pizza : Delivering Pizza to the Space Station? Boss, this is just not right!』 is a platformer challenge game where you deliver Hawaiian pizzas to a space station.

Gameplay

  • Keep the pizza balanced and avoid falling!

    It’s a game where you must climb while keeping the pizza balanced. Make sure to maintain its balance carefully so it doesn’t fall.

  • Watch out for various obstacles and falling!

    Obstacles that hinder the pigeon delivering pizza are scattered everywhere, and you will lose the pizza if hit. You’ll also drop the pizza when falling from high places.

  • Jump!

    Jump across various platforms and complete your pizza delivery mission.

  • There’s an assist mode to help your journey.

    If it feels too difficult, you can enable an assist mode to help with the pizza delivery. This activates an alternative way to play, suitable for players unfamiliar with this type of game.

Ready For Delivery

Are you ready for delivery? Can you complete this perilous delivery and successfully bring the Hawaiian pizzas to the space station?

Embark on your journey to space now!

highlighted.name: wings that cut through the wind!

detailed_description:
Content Creation and Live Streaming Guide

You are free to create and stream content. However, it would be a great help to us if you could include a link to our store.

Thank you.
For further inquiries, please contact us at anomalyguys@gmail.com.


Social Media

  • Check out the latest game news on our social media channels!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 2700x 8Core 3.70Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 2700x 8Core 3.70Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1070-TI
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: GuGu Pizza’s motto is to deliver anywhere! So couldn't refuse the pineapple pizza order that came from the space station. Eventually, the pigeon deliveryman begins a high-altitude jump to deliver pizza to space, passing through the city, forest, and sky...
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
